An excellent game with a  unique style of puzzles with some good "out of the box" thinking. The controls are simple, interactions basic, adding to the amazement of the complexity and ingenuity of the puzzles. It's not a long game - took roughly 13 hours to go through start to finish. But this one I would definitely recommend if you like puzzle games.

If anyone said to me, "Video Games cannot be art" I would simply say "Portal". This game is amazing, not just gameplay-wise, but story-wise as well. After finishing this game, I was so deep into the story, its what got me into the Half-Life story, and the Counter-Strike franchise. I love this game. When I learned that the story is bigger than just the Portal game, I immediately rushed to find the lore of it all, and i'm still doing it today. If you're the type of person to play games, this is a game for you. If you're the type of person to play a game for the lore, this is a game for you. If you're bored of the games you have right now and you want a better game, This is the game for you. If anyone came to me asking for a game to play, I would suggest Portal to them.

Ein sehr würdiger Nachfolger des ersten Teils der sich des selben Charme und Humors bedient. 

Definitiv ein knackiger Knobelspaß der einen mehr wie einmal dazu drängt um mehrere Ecken zu denken und über den eigenen Tellerrand hinaus zu schauen.

Apropos  [i] eigener [/i] Tellerand, diesen kann man auch wunderbar mit einem Freund erweitern, welcher einen tatkräftig beim Kopfzerbrechen unterstützt.

Excellent game on all fronts (co-op's great, too). 
If you only had time to play either Portal or Portal 2, play Portal 2 (you hardly miss anything story-wise from the first game).

Francamente, que jogo maravilhoso, só pude terminar essa obra-prima esse ano pq só consegui um pc agora, mas francamente, tu pode jogar esse jogo daqui a uns 30 anos que ele vai envelhecer super bem.

os gráficos são ótimos, a jogabilidade é simples porém incrível, os puzzles são bem construídos, os personagens são (pra mim) o ponto mais alto desse jogo, a GlaDos e o Wheatley são personagens sensacionais e apesar de serem apenas I.A. são super bem desenvolvidos.

Se você pensa comprar esse jogo, nem precisa esperar promoção, pq os seus 20 reais vão valer MUITO a pena.

nota final: 10/10

This game is amazing with a very good story line and game mechanics. The puzzles are good and have a good variety of difficulty. The characters are great! I love GlaDOs' dry humor and Wheatley's stupidity. It's a joy to play through and a game that I will replay at any chance I get.

Also, the lemons speech is the greatest thing ever.
awesome game 10/10

Gran secuela de Portal 1, gráficos mejorados, una historia más profunda y trabajada que el original, nuevos artilugios que añaden mecánicas a los puzles . A veces puede sentirse un poco alargado con demasiadas cámaras de pruebas extra, pero ante todo sigue siendo divertido y es una buena compra.
Muy bueno, una joyita de Valve, buena campaña, muiy entretenida, difícil y con coop.
